text: Alfonso Fidalgo Lopez (born June 11, 1969, in Cembranos) is a track and field athlete from Spain. He has a disability: He is blind and a F11/T11/B1 type athlete. He was at the 1996 Summer Paralympics. He finished first in the F11 shot put and first in the F11 discus. He was at the 2000 Summer Paralympics. He finished second in the F11 shot put and first in the F11 discus == References == Category:Living people Category:1969 births Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Spain Category:Paralympic gold medalists for Spain Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:2000 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type T11 Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type B1 Category:Spanish discus throwers Category:Shot putters
